nodes.text: The CX-55 scatterblaster was a model of scatterblaster used by the Alazmec of Winsit, a group of cultists that were drawn to the Corvax Fen on the planet Mustafar. The blaster had a a brown stock and a long black barrel, with sections of silver paneling around the muzzle and just in front of the trigger. The weapon fired yellow blaster bolts.

In 35 ABY, the forces of the First Order led by Supreme Leader Kylo Ren fought the Alazmec in order to obtain a Sith wayfinder. During the battle, at least two cultists used CX-55 scatterblasters while fighting Ren, but he deflected their shots using his lightsaber and slew the two cultists with the blade.

The CX-55 scatterblaster first appeared in the 2019 sequel trilogy film, Star Wars: Episode IX The Rise of Skywalker. The weapons were not identified in the film, but recieved a name in the accompanying reference book Star Wars: The Rise of Skywalker: The Visual Dictionary, which was written by Pablo Hidalgo.
